title: Chat Filtered
body: even after doing /chatfilter it is still filtered

replies.body:
That's strange, the /chatfilter command in-game should fix this up.  Try manually enabling the filter as well through your directory:

- Close League of Legends
- Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(lat est version)\deploy\preferences
- Open up the shared(summoner name).PROPERTIES file up with Notepad
- It should say:
[Chat]
EnableChatFilter=1
- Just change the 1 to a 0. Hit Ctrl+S to save it.

Let me know if that helps!
so when i go there i get a screen full of code. i hit Ctrl+F to find enable and and put =0 after it. still not fixed i can paste the wall of text from the properties if you want

Thanks for trying!  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look with you.  This may ultimately be a bug, but we'll see if there's anything we can do.  Hang tight until then!
